### Exercises

#### *(T)* Quiz

```{r tree-quiz-intro, echo=FALSE}
question("Which statements about CART are true?",
  answer("The prediction function defined by a CART divides the feature space into disjoint hyperrectangles.", correct = TRUE),
    answer("The root node contains all data", correct = TRUE),
    answer("The leaf node contains all data"),
    answer("Observations can end up in several leaf nodes at the same time."),
    answer("The CART algorithm recursively splits nodes into child nodes.", correct = TRUE)
)
```
